thread.title: Ryan Malm
thread.title_full: Freeze Pro Shop reviewed by Ryan Malm

author: Ryan Malm
title: Ryan Malm
text: Freeze Pro Shop is my new go to website for everything snowboard related. Not only were the products priced lower than other sites, the extra ten percent off when buying a board and binding combo pretty much covered the shipping cost. I live in california and ordered a spring break board and some unions on Monday afternoon and crossed my fingers that I'd be able to ride that weekend. the board showed up wednesday, two days after i ordered it! Could not be happier with the site and service.
